Description.Text: The Sheraton Brooklyn New York Hotel is located only one subway stop from Manhattan and easily accessible to three subway stops from all the major express and local connections. Convenient to the MetroTech Center, the historic neighborhood of Brooklyn Heights and the dynamic BAM cultural district, our Brooklyn hotel is at the center of all of Brooklyn's business and leisure attractions. At the end of a long day, be sure to experience the relaxation of the indoor heated pool and jacuzzi in the solarium, featuring a retractable roof. With 4,300 square feet of meeting space, Brooklyn hotel accommodates groups from 10 to 400 people. Facilities include 2 distinctive spaces, including an outdoor rooftop deck for a more unique and intimate gathering. For intimate events to corporate functions, the professional event specialists are prepared to plan the perfect event. They also feature a separate kosher kitchen for catered events.

Sheraton Brooklyn New York hotel is at the center of Brooklyn's top attractions. We are within walking distance to Brooklyn Heights with its historic brownstones and "BAM", the Brooklyn-style Lincoln Center cultural district. Walk across the iconic Brooklyn Bridge or visit the nearby Brooklyn Museum of Art, the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens or the Brooklyn Zoo.

All room guests have a standard room choice between a king bed with stall shower or two double beds with combination tub/shower. All rooms feature the renowned Sweet Sleeper BedTM with fine linens, down-filled pillows and comforter, HSIA or WIFI access at a charge, work desk with ergonomic chair, an iPod Home Docking station with stereo clock radio, a coffee/tea maker with Starbucks coffee, a 42" High Definition flat panel television, upgraded Bliss bathroom amenities and a lighted vanity mirror. Robes and slippers are available on a request basis.

Grubstake Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner daily, offering classic American cuisine in a sophisticated, urban setting. If you prefer a quick meal or cocktail at the bar, visit The Grustake Lobby Lounge. Located in the lobby, adjacent to the Link@Sheraton, The Brooklyn Café Bar offers the ideal place to relax with friends or catch up with colleagues over a glass of wine or a cocktail. The Brooklyn Terrace - Rooftop Lounge Located on the 26th floor, you can soak up incredible views of Brooklyn, the Statue of Liberty, Verrazano Bridge, and Ellis Island. The spacious rooftop outdoor terrace is offers great views and a chance to enjoy fresh air and your favorite cocktails.

Staying connected in the lobby has never been easier or more fun than at the Link@SheratonSM experienced with Microsoft® - Sheraton signature lobby-based communications hub that includes a 52" HD flat screen television, newspapers, magazines, multiple Internet-enabled workstations with 24/7 Ethernet and Wi-Fi connectivity, plus printing services - all complimentary for all guests. Grab a bite to eat, play games, get online and meet with friends, family or clients. With the Link@SheratonSM at Sheraton Brooklyn hotel, you can take care of business or simply relax in a lively, social atmosphere.
